    • Method Detail

      • getNetworkCurrenciesFromNemesis

        public io.reactivex.Observable<java.util.List<NetworkCurrency>> getNetworkCurrenciesFromNemesis()
        Description copied from interface: NetworkCurrencyService
        This method returns the list of NetworkCurrency found in block 1.

        The intent of this method is to resolve the configured main (like cat.currency or symbol.xym) and harvest currencies (cat.harvest). More currencies may be defined in the block one.

        Specified by:
        getNetworkCurrenciesFromNemesis in interface NetworkCurrencyService
        Returns:
        the list of NetworkCurrency found in block 1.

      • getNetworkCurrencyFromMosaicId

        public io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkCurrency> getNetworkCurrencyFromMosaicId(MosaicId mosaicId)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkCurrencyService
        This method resolves a NetworkCurrency from a known MosaicId using rest. The NetworkCurrency will contain the first resolved alias / namespace id if exist.
        Specified by:
        getNetworkCurrencyFromMosaicId in interface NetworkCurrencyService
        Parameters:
        mosaicId - the mosaic id
        Returns:
        the NetworkCurrency of the given mosaic id.

      • getNetworkCurrencyFromNamespaceId

        public io.reactivex.Observable<NetworkCurrency> getNetworkCurrencyFromNamespaceId(NamespaceId namespaceId)
        Description copied from interface: NetworkCurrencyService
        This method resolves a NetworkCurrency from a known NamespaceId using rest.
        Specified by:
        getNetworkCurrencyFromNamespaceId in interface NetworkCurrencyService
        Parameters:
        namespaceId - the namespace id
        Returns:
        the NetworkCurrency of the given namespace id.
